title: Finance minister asks industry to join 'Team India', step up investment - Times of India
content:
1. Finance minister asks industry to join 'Team India', step up investment  Times of India
  2. Exclusive: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman's interview after Budget 2022  Economic Times
  3. Finance Ministry exhorts India Inc to open up their purse for sustained growth  The New Indian Express
  4. Finance Minister Urges Corporates To Support Economic Growth  NDTV Profit
  5. 'This is a Budget for continuity': Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman  Hindustan Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: India Business News: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman on Monday asked the private sector to join 'Team India' and step up their investments in line with the government'
